review: The Fire Stick is fast, easy to setup and operate.  There is plenty of content and with Amazon Prime I have lots to choose from.  I like this much better than my Chromecast.
author: Greg Jackson

review: Works great gave to my mom for a gift and she is not very tech savvy but she said it was easy to start up and get going. She uses it every day.

review: To start off, we got this because we wanted to watch Amazon Prime on TV rather than mirroring it from our iPad to appletv. It's a whole lot better than chromecast!  You do not need to get apps for it or have an android product. All setup too, right out of the box, would recommend this product!
